DOC.criteria: Healthy , male female , age 18 40 , BMI 19 27 kg/m2 , normotensive ( BP 90/60 mmHg 140/90 mmHg ) , native fluent Germanspeaking , caucasian ( European ancestry ) , able willing give write informed consent comply requirement study protocol , willing donate saliva sample DNAanalysis Acute chronic psychiatric somatic disorder , tachycardia rest ( > 100 bpm ) , know hypersensitivity salbutamol , pathological ECG , pregnancy , breastfeeding , longterm medication within last 3 month ( oral contraceptive disregard ) smoking ( > 3 cigarette per day ) , concurrent participation another study , participation one previous study use memory test , inability read understand participant 's information .
